Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life and his creative years. The first one is devoted to childhood and young adulthood . Miyazawa is depicted as innocent .
